## Vector3.RotationFromAxisToRef() method

The same than RotationFromAxis but updates the given ref Vector3 parameter instead of returning a new Vector3

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static RotationFromAxisToRef(axis1: Vector3, axis2: Vector3, axis3: Vector3, ref: Vector3): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  axis1 | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the first axis |
|  axis2 | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the second axis |
|  axis3 | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the third axis |
|  ref | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the Vector3 where to store the result |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
